article.Heading: Real estate sector will benefit from GST: President, Hyderabad CREDAI
article.Summary: In an interview to CNN-News18's Sakshi Khanna, Ram Reddy President, Hyd CREDAI spoke about the goods and services tax (GST) and its impacts on real estate sector and Indian economy.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNN-News18's Sakshi Khanna, Ram Reddy President, Hyderabad CREDAI spoke about the goods and services tax (GST) and its impacts on real estate sector and Indian economy.
